org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.messages

Class DhcpMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.directory.server.dhcp.messages.DhcpMessage

  • public class DhcpMessage
extends Object
    A DHCP (RFC 2131) message. Field descriptions contain the oroginal RFC field names in brackets.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FLAG_BROADCAST
      Flag value: request broadcast answer.
      static byte OP_BOOTREPLY
      Operation constant: boot reply (server to client).
      static byte OP_BOOTREQUEST
      Operation constant: boot request (client to server).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DhcpMessage()
      Create a default dhcp message.
      DhcpMessage(MessageType messageType, byte op, HardwareAddress hardwareAddress, short hops, int transactionId, int seconds, short flags, InetAddress currentClientAddress, InetAddress assignedClientAddress, InetAddress nextServerAddress, InetAddress relayAgentAddress, String serverHostname, String bootFileName, OptionsField options)
      Create a DHCP message based on the supplied values.
